title: Bonus Episode: Root Check (Holly Furtick)
description: “Strong women don’t happen by accident.” In “Root Check,” the first lady of Elevation Church, Holly Furtick, shares a special message for women about being rooted in Christ, fostering a strong community, and becoming a woman of action. Learn how to answer the calling on your life and build a foundation that can weather any storm.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
